classic.translation[0].definitions[0].de: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation
classic.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Too many job hunters make the classic mistake of thinking only about what’s in it for them.
classic.translation[0].definitions[1].de: admired by many people, and having a value that has continued for a long time
classic.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The Coca-Cola bottle is one of the classic designs of the last century.
classic.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Roy scored a classic goal in the 90th minute.
classic.translation[0].definitions[3].de: a classic style of art or clothing is attractive in a simple traditional way
classic.translation[0].definitions[3].ex: She chose a classic navy suit for the ceremony.
classic.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time
classic.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: ‘La Grande Illusion’ is one of the classics of French cinema.
The play has become an American classic.
classic.translation[1].definitions[1].de: something that is very good and one of the best examples of its kind
classic.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: What makes a car a classic?
